title: Creating Quarkus Project behind Proxy-Policy Nexus Maven Repository
body:
### Describe the bug

Hello,

I getting an error just try to create an empty project with maven:

mvn io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.8.0.Final:create -X

PS ~\ms_testquarkus> mvn io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.8.0.Final:create -X

### Expected behavior

I expected to create and build a simple project from my local machine.

### Actual behavior

I getting this error:

Plugin io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.8.0.Final or one of its dependencies could not be resolved: Failed to read artifact descriptor for io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.8.0.Final: Could not transfer artifact io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:pom:2.8.0.Final from/to mirrorId (http://NEXUSSERVER:PORT/repository/maven-central/): No connector factories available -> [Help 1]
org.apache.maven.plugin.PluginResolutionException: Plugin io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.8.0.Final or one of its dependencies could not be resolved: Failed to read artifact descriptor for io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.8.0.Final

### How to Reproduce?

mvn io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.8.0.Final:create -X

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Apache Maven 3.8.5

### Output of `java -version`

Java version: 13.0.2, vendor: Oracle Corporation

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

git version 2.28.0.windows.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.5

### Additional information

Nexus Repo:

http://NEXUSSERVER:PORT/repository/maven-central/io/quarkus/platform/quarkus-maven-plugin/2.8.0.Final/quarkus-maven-plugin-2.8.0.Final.pom


Index of /io/quarkus/platform/quarkus-maven-plugin/2.8.0.Final
